reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more irritation!
reviews.reviewText: As a "sensitive" skin person, I finally figured out that conventional tampons weren't doing me any favors either. I would always end my cycle with irritation, itching and a yeast infection kind of feeling. After reading about the causes for this, I learned that other tampons contain chemicals and dyes to bleach the cotton. Also, the cotton causes micrortears in the vaginal wall, leading to the irritation. As if having a monthly period isn't bad enough, throw in the discomfort of a yeast infection and it's double trouble! Since using the organic cotton tampons, I haven't experienced the usual irritation at the end of a few days using tampons!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2007
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: I really trust these. Natracare tampons are manufactured in Europe under strict guidlines in a sterile environment. They are organic cotton with no rayon, and are bleached with hydrogen peroxide instead of chlorine. They are available with applicators and without- in the case of those with applicators, they are cardboard. (I will say Natracare has changed the applicator in the past couple of years, and I'm not totally wild about the new design- sort of an "asterisk" shape at the opening of the cardboard applicator which the tampon must pass through- which I find rather unnecessary) But I still think that these are the best tampons out there. Safe, naturally bleached organic cotton. No scents, no rayon, no plastic applicators, no dioxins, no junk. Simple. Great. I give these as many stars as I can, and then some. Absolutely worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2005
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These are good
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited to find an organic tampon with an applicator. These are quite good. The only think I didn't like was that they are bigger than what I am used to. Normally, I get the 'slender regular' in the non-organic tampons and these are just 'regular'. I'll have to see if Natracare have another, slightly lighter, variety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the only tampons I use
reviews.reviewText: On heavy days, I do need to switch them out in under two hours so I feel that even for regular, they could be a little more absorbent but they are comfortable and I feel better knowing they aren’t filled with chemicals. I’m petite and just can’t get the hang of cups or disks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2010
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't test on animals
reviews.reviewText: I love the products offered by this company because they don't test on animals. I found a list on the PETA website that told me all of the companys that are animal friendly and I'm doing my best to purchase products from that list. The products from this line are also not bleached which I heard can cause you to bleed more. It's bad enough to have products that impact the environment in a negative way, why would I want to put it so close to my body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tampons I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: Soooo happy lol. I ordered a different brand ages ago, and they cut and scratched so bad!! I was hesitant with these. But thank heavens they work marvelously. The string could be a touch longer, but that's no big deal. And to get it to run 'smoothly', you do have to push it forward in its applicator just a bit so the cotton protrudes slightly from the applicator. Sooooo glad they're not scratchy and irritating!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Be very careful!!!
reviews.reviewText: Be very careful with these. I don’t know if my PH just didn’t react well or what. But last night I put one of these in before bed. First time trying. When I woke up and went to take it out the string was gone. No problem usually they still pop right out on the toilet. Except this one wasn’t. I tried for two hours with a mirror to get it out and I couldn’t. Panic set in and I decided to go to the ER. At the ER they did an exam and told me the tampon had halfway dissolved by my cervix. They had to flush me out and give me a round of antibiotics to prevent an infection. I only had this tampon in a few hours prior to this happening. The hospital said I did nothing wrong and couldn’t have prevented this. Just be careful. I don’t know if I got a bad batch or what. I will never risk it again though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Organic Product
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for what they are intended for ;)Using organic in such a personal place is very important to me and I like this brand the best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try a more natural tampon product than the products offered in the supermarkets which are often bleached and harmful to ph levels. I found this brand and am so glad I did- the product is great, it’s soft and comfortable to wear, just as good as others with the added benefit of being better for the environment. Will definitely continue to buy these and recommend.

très belle inovation! jolis emballages individuels en papier, très bien! extrêmement confortables! seul bémol: il se trouvent être un peu encombrant; pour cause: ils sont emballés sous leur forme "déployés" dû à l'applicateur.
A great natural alternatives. It's a bit to get used to the applicator vs plastic ones but I still recommend.
Igual que los tampax normales, lo único el precio, sale mucho más caro.

Super! The best tampons available in Europe. No plastic, applicator works well, nice organic cotton so no yucky toxins, and a decent price too from Parkem Retsil (good seller I've bought many times from).
